attributes.title: ph-ee overview

sample.kql: Attributes.k8s.container.name:(zeebe OR zeebe-gateway) AND Body:("writer is full" OR "Failed to write client request")

params.message: {{^context.isRatio}}{{#context.group}}{{context.group}} - {{/context.group}}{{context.matchingDocuments}} log entries have matched the following conditions: {{context.conditions}}{{/context.isRatio}}{{#context.isRatio}}{{#context.group}}{{context.group}} - {{/context.group}} Ratio of the count of log entries matching {{context.numeratorConditions}} to the count of log entries matching {{context.denominatorConditions}} was {{context.ratio}}{{/context.isRatio}}

Ops-App p95 breach: ratio={{context.threshold[0]}}%
A={{context.matches.A.count}}  B={{context.matches.B.count}}

kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON: {"query":{"query":"Attributes.k8s.container.name:\"zeebe-gateway\" AND Body:\"io.camunda.zeebe.gateway.cmd.BrokerErrorException: Received error from broker (INTERNAL_ERROR): Failed to write client request to partition '1', because the writer is full.\"","language":"kuery"},"filter":[],"indexRefName":"kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON.index"}

{"query":{"query":"Attributes.k8s.container.name: ph-ee-connector-*
AND NOT Attributes.k8s.container.name: ph-ee-connector-channel
AND (Attributes.zeebe_job_key:* OR Body:"Job ")

","language":"kuery"},"filter":[],"indexRefName":"kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON.index"}

{"query":{"query":"Attributes.data_stream.dataset:"ph-ee"
AND (
  Attributes.clientRefId:*            /* inbound */
  OR Attributes.transactionId:*       /* workflow starts */
  OR Attributes.zeebe_instance_key:*  /* workflow starts */
  OR Attributes.zeebe_job_key:*       /* job starts */
)
","language":"kuery"},"filter":[],"indexRefName":"kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON.index"}
